archdesc.bioghist: Founded in 1998, the Council is a diverse group of citizens from Benton Harbor and Saint Joseph, Michigan dedicated to fostering interracial understanding and mutual respect.
archdesc.scopecontent: Informational material; questionnaires (with tabulation) from survey of attitudes and perceptions of African American and white high school students, community college students, and church members towards each other; also report on mortgage applications in the area.
